test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationMultiply-9
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-DayTimeDurationMultiply-9 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: Simple test of multiplying a xs:dayTimeDuration with NaN. *******************************************************

test-case.name: cbcl-multiply-dayTimeDuration-001
test-case.description: test multiplication of xs:dayTimeDuration by 0
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($days as xs:integer) as xs:dayTimeDuration { xs:dayTimeDuration(concat("P", $days, "D")) }; local:dayTimeDuration(2) * 0

test-case.name: cbcl-multiply-dayTimeDuration-002
test-case.description: test multiplication of xs:dayTimeDuration by 1
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($days as xs:integer) as xs:dayTimeDuration { xs:dayTimeDuration(concat("P", $days, "D")) }; local:dayTimeDuration(2) * 1

test-case.name: cbcl-multiply-dayTimeDuration-003
test-case.description: test multiplication of xs:dayTimeDuration by NaN
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($days as xs:integer) as xs:dayTimeDuration { xs:dayTimeDuration(concat("P", $days, "D")) }; local:dayTimeDuration(2) * xs:double("NaN")

test-case.name: cbcl-multiply-dayTimeDuration-004
test-case.description: test multiplication of xs:dayTimeDuration by 0
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($days as xs:integer) as xs:dayTimeDuration { xs:dayTimeDuration(concat("P", $days, "D")) }; 0 * local:dayTimeDuration(2)

test-case.name: cbcl-multiply-dayTimeDuration-005
test-case.description: test multiplication of xs:dayTimeDuration by 1
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($days as xs:integer) as xs:dayTimeDuration { xs:dayTimeDuration(concat("P", $days, "D")) }; 1 * local:dayTimeDuration(2)

test-case.name: cbcl-multiply-dayTimeDuration-006
test-case.description: test multiplication of xs:dayTimeDuration by NaN
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($days as xs:integer) as xs:dayTimeDuration { xs:dayTimeDuration(concat("P", $days, "D")) }; xs:double("NaN") * local:dayTimeDuration(2)

test-case.name: cbcl-times-001
test-case.description: Test behaviour of times operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; local:f(false()) * 2

test-case.name: cbcl-times-002
test-case.description: Test behaviour of times operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; local:f(true()) * 2

test-case.name: cbcl-times-003
test-case.description: Test behaviour of times operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") }; local:f(false()) * 2

test-case.name: cbcl-times-004
test-case.description: Test behaviour of times operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") }; local:f(true()) * 2

test-case.name: cbcl-times-005
test-case.description: Test behaviour of times operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; 2 * local:f(false())

test-case.name: cbcl-times-006
test-case.description: Test behaviour of times operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; 2 * local:f(true())

test-case.name: cbcl-times-007
test-case.description: Test behaviour of times operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") }; 2 * local:f(false())

test-case.name: cbcl-times-008
test-case.description: Test behaviour of times operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") }; 2 * local:f(true())
